documentation.text:
@dev Unwind allows everyone to recover their assets from the Yield protocol in the event of a MakerDAO shutdown.
 During the unwind process, the system debt to MakerDAO is settled first with `settleTreasury`, extracting all free weth.
 Once the Treasury is settled, any system savings are converted from Chai to Weth using `cashSavings`.
 At this point, users can settle their positions using `settle`. The MakerDAO rates will be used to convert all debt and collateral to a Weth payout.
 Users can also redeem here their yDai for a Weth payout, using `redeem`.
@dev max(0, x - y)
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to int256
@dev Disables treasury, controller and liquidations.
@dev Settle system debt in MakerDAO and free remaining collateral.
@dev Put all chai savings in MakerDAO and exchange them for weth

@dev Settles a user vault in Liquidations, and then returns any remaining collateral as weth using the unwind Dai to Weth price.
 @param user User vault to settle, and wallet to receive the corresponding weth.

@dev Unwind allows everyone to recover their assets from the Yield protocol in the event of a MakerDAO shutdown.
 During the unwind process, the system debt to MakerDAO is settled first with `settleTreasury`, extracting all free weth.
 Once the Treasury is settled, any system savings are converted from Chai to Weth using `cashSavings`.
 At this point, users can settle their positions using `settle`. The MakerDAO rates will be used to convert all debt and collateral to a Weth payout.
 Users can also redeem here their yDai for a Weth payout, using `redeem`.
@dev max(0, x - y)
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to int256
@dev Disables treasury, controller and liquidations.
@dev Settle system debt in MakerDAO and free remaining collateral.
@dev Put all chai savings in MakerDAO and exchange them for weth

@dev Settles a user vault in Liquidations, and then returns any remaining collateral as weth using the unwind Dai to Weth price.
 @param user User vault to settle, and wallet to receive the corresponding weth.

devdoc.details: Unwind allows everyone to recover their assets from the Yield protocol in the event of a MakerDAO shutdown. During the unwind process, the system debt to MakerDAO is settled first with `settleTreasury`, extracting all free weth. Once the Treasury is settled, any system savings are converted from Chai to Weth using `cashSavings`. At this point, users can settle their positions using `settle`. The MakerDAO rates will be used to convert all debt and collateral to a Weth payout. Users can also redeem here their yDai for a Weth payout, using `redeem`.

cashSavings().details: Put all chai savings in MakerDAO and exchange them for weth

chaiToDai(uint256,uint256).details: Return the Dai equivalent value to a Chai amount.

constructor.details: The constructor links to vat, daiJoin, weth, wethJoin, jug, pot, end, chai, treasury, controller and liquidations. Liquidations should have privileged access to treasury, controller and liquidations using orchestration. The constructor gives treasury and end permission on unwind's MakerDAO vaults.

daiToFixWeth(uint256,uint256).details: Return the Weth equivalent value to a Dai amount, during Dss Shutdown

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeem(uint256,address).details: Redeems YDai for weth for any user. YDai.redeem won't work if MakerDAO is in shutdown.

params.user: Wallet containing the yDai to burn.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

settle(bytes32,address).details: Settles a series position in Controller for any user, and then returns any remaining collateral as weth using the unwind Dai to Weth price.

params.user: User vault to settle, and wallet to receive the corresponding weth.

settleLiquidations(address).details: Settles a user vault in Liquidations, and then returns any remaining collateral as weth using the unwind Dai to Weth price.

params.user: User vault to settle, and wallet to receive the corresponding weth.

settleTreasury().details: Settle system debt in MakerDAO and free remaining collateral.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
